ComicInfo.Title: Here's Negan!: Chapter 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
IMAGE+ is a monthly magazine featuring Image's upcoming releases, as well as bonus creator-owned comics content. Each issue will feature an original, four-page THE WALKING DEAD story concerning Negan's origins, and created by New York Times bestselling team ROBERT KIRKMAN and CHARLIE ADLARD, for a total of 48 pages of backstory! IMAGE+ will also showcase interviews, spotlight features, bonus never-before-seen preview pages, editorials from industry voices, and more in-depth, insightful and provocative comics coverage curated by David Brothers, Branding Manager at Image Comics. IMAGE+ is fans' premiere source for all things creator-owned.
*Table of Contents* Front cover: Reborn #1 Comic Lovers (IFC) - Story & Art: Brandon Graham Letter From the Publisher: Summer Books, Summer Looks - Foreward by David Brothers A close look at Moonshine: What is it that makes Brian Azzarello & Eduardo Risso so good? Moonshine #1 - Story: Brian Azzarello / Art & Colors: Eduardo Risso Brian Buccellato, Jennifer Young, & Matias Bergara: Cannibals in the Everglades, and a small town on the edge.* Cannibal #1 - Story: Brian Buccellato & Jennifer Young / Art: Mat√≠as Bergara Comics Uncovered: Let some horror into your life this fall - Article by Sam Stone Bryan Hill & Nelson Blake II: Death comes for the secret rulers of the world.* Romulus #1 - Story: Bryan Hill / Art: Nelson Blake II Shop Spotlight: Chicago Comics & Quimby's (Chicago, IL) The Walking Dead: "The Whisperer War" - Centerfold artwork by Charlie Adlard & Dave Stewart Max Landis & Giuseppe Camuncoli: Four knights try to beat impossible odds.* Green Valley #1 - Story: Max Landis / Art: Giuseppe Camuncoli / Inks: Cliff Rathburn / Colors: Jean-Francois Beaulieu Jamie S. Rich & George Kambadais: The most feel-good murder mystery in the world.* The Double Life of Miranda Turner - Vol. 1: If You Have Ghosts (TPB) - Story: Jamie S. Rich / Art: George Kambadais A close look at Reborn: Mark Millar & Greg Capullo have a secret for you... Reborn #1 - Concept art & art spreads by Greg Capullo Robert Kirkman: Skybound's head honcho looks back on thirteen years of The Walking Dead.* The Walking Dead: Here's Negan!, Chapter 4 - Story: Robert Kirkman / Art: Charlie Adlard / Gray Tones: Cliff Rathburn / Letterer: Rus Wooton / Editor: Sean Mackiewicz Image Comics October Checklist / Order Form Back cover: Romulus #1 Note: Titles in bold letters denote original content. Titles in bold and italic letters denote exclusive previews and first looks. Asterisks denote interviews. Everything else are articles unless otherwise noted.
